script.name: !plugin.autotrade.getroute.short
script.description: Autotrade - Get best trade route (short range)

line.comment: * create and copy array with all tradeable wares
* Iterate through wares and find best buy/sell combination
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* script call has been updated for LU 1.3.5
* Get trade amount for this route
* Extra check: If sellstation is player-owned and bankrupt, blacklist it
* and search again for a sellstation
* NOPE, no blacklist function available, skip ware entirely instead
* retry the same ware with another sellstation
* Add used fuel into profit calc
* inexperienced traders use first best route found
